name: iFly_Reupload
description:
Third person platformer but the camera does not follow

Reupload. Compile failed initially.

iFly

Controller required.

Use the rightstick to control the fly camera and the left stick for the baby. Triggers used for adjusting the speed, shoulder buttons for the. Eat food with X. The baby will interact with Y. Collect the keys to unlock the door! Some objects can be pushed by the fly camera. Click rightstick to track the baby, a pro wouldn't need to tho.
